page.title: 01EDUCATIONAL SUMMARY OF BLOCK
page.content:
The area covered by the block is a varied one, in terms of land use, history and administration. Although Failsworth is the main housing area, there have been 3 education authorities and 8 schools involved in collecting information for this survey. {OLDHAM -}Kaskenmoor,Failsworth Comprehensives,St.John's and Holy Family junior schools.
{MANCHESTER -}Broadhurst,All Saints and St. Wilfred's junior schools.These schools are in the Western part of the block - the Newton Heath and Moston Brook areas.
{TAMESIDE -}Littlemoss Boys School. This area is South of the river Medlock and includes parts of Droylsden and Ashton Under Lyne.
